summary: Tarzan finds a boy from a crashed plane and raises him with Jane in the jungle. A search party comes looking for the plane.
cast: Johnny Weissmuller|Maureen O'Sullivan|Johnny Sheffield|Ian Hunter|Henry Stephenson|Frieda Inescort|Henry Wilcoxon|Laraine Day|Morton Lowry|Uriah Banks|Gavin Muir
